summary: An ordinance approving and confirming amended and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2126, for the improvement of 14th Avenue West, from the north margin of West Howe Street to the north margin of Gilman Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete and wooden sidewalks thereon and all necessary cross walks, under Ordinance No. 21370 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
